citation: Proclamation under the Waste and Resource Recovery Act 2022 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Waste and Resource Recovery Act 2022

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Waste and Resource Recovery Act 2022 fix 1 July 2022 as the day on which Parts 3 and 4 of that Act commence.

2 May 2022

B. BAKER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

R. C. JAENSCH

Minister for Environment and Climate Change

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 11 May 2022

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Natural Resources and Environment Tasmania.
